title: Scaramucci and Priebus Are Out, Trump Threatens to Blow Up Obamacare: A Closer Look | Jim Gaffigan
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the Trump White House in turmoil after the sudden firing of Communications Director Anthony Scaramucci days after the resignation of former Chief of Staff Reince Priebus. (0:20)
Then, comedian Jim Gaffigan chats with Seth about his wife's brain surgery to remove a tumor and why he'd love to be an anesthesiologist. (10:51)
Gaffigan, joined by his wife and one of his daughters, then chats a little longer with Late Night producer Kevin Miller backstage at Studio 8G. (10:35)
